tool.name: Compare cell type annotations

configfiles.configfile: import scanpy as sc import muon as mu from sklearn.metrics import adjusted_rand_score as ari import seaborn as sns mdata = mu.read_h5mu('$rna_atac_input') ari(mdata.obs['rna:celltype'], mdata.obs['atac:celltype']) df_total = (mdata.obs.groupby("atac:celltype").size().reset_index(name="n_total").set_index("atac:celltype")) df = (mdata.obs.groupby(["atac:celltype", "rna:celltype"]).size().reset_index(name="n").set_index("atac:celltype").join(df_total).reset_index()) df_frac = df.assign(frac = lambda x: x.n / x.n_total) df_wide = df_frac.set_index("atac:celltype").pivot(columns="rna:celltype", values="frac") heatmap_plot = sns.heatmap(df_wide, cmap="Greys") fig = heatmap_plot.get_figure() fig.savefig("rna_atac_comparison_heatmap.png")

tool.help: **What it does** This tool compares how the cell type annotations in individual modalities match each other. We first use the adjusted Rand index to calculate a general score to compare the two modalities. Then we look at how these cell type annotations match per cell and then make it into a wide table and visualize it with a heatmap.
